events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred yesterday on a busy street, causing significant damage.
After initial review, the claim has been categorised under Auto Accident as it involves a vehicle collision.
An agent specialized in auto insurance claims has been assigned to handle this case and coordinate further steps.
The insurer has acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the process will begin promptly.
Request sent to the customer for required documents, including police report and car repair estimates.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including detailed accident photos and the police notification report.
Investigation team has been engaged to assess the vehicle damage and verify details of the reported accident.
Investigation concluded confirming the circumstances of the collision and the estimated repair costs.
A settlement amount was proposed based on investigation findings, covering damages and repair expenses.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and requested to proceed with the payment.
The claim has been formally approved following customer agreement to the settlement terms.
Payment has been issued to the customerâ€™s designated bank account to cover the vehicle repair costs.
The claim case is now closed after successful payment and confirmation from the customer that repairs are underway.
